message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12000 for the product?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $13500.
I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to consider a price of $13000 for the product?
I'm getting a bit closer to your price, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $13000. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000.
I'm still trying to find a price that works for both of us. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $13500?
I'm getting close to the price I was initially looking for, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $14250.
I'm not willing to go any higher than $13500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
